alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Meriwether; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 9:53AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Spalding, northeastern Meriwether, Pike, northwestern Upson and southeastern Coweta Counties through 1030 AM EDT... At 953 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Molena, or 10 miles east of Greenville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Zebulon, Senoia, Woodbury, Brooks, Molena, Williamson, Orchard Hill, Meansville, Haralson, Gay, Sunset Village, Atwater, Hilltop, Lifsey Springs, Hollonville, Alvaton, Rover, Crest, Digbey and Zetella. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
